title: Incredibly high ping since last few updates
body:
Hiya,

I've got a bit of an issue with high ping. Normally, being someone who isn't in NA but plays NA anyway, my ping is around 220, and it dropped down to 175 after the Chicago move. The last few patches though have sent my ping skyrocketing up to anywhere between 250 and 700, with wild fluctuations.

I have tested in two separate computers, 4 separate accounts and two separate locations, wired and wireless. I have turned off all background programs, no change. Closing Skype/Steam/browsers only improves ping by 10ish and the fluctuations up to 700 remain. My ping is incredibly high no matter what. There is no issue with other games - playing on a Chicago TF2 server is not a problem, I can get 170 ping on such a server.

Running a tracert goes fine until the very last hop, where the ms skyrockets, like so: 15   257 ms   301 ms   881 ms  104.160.131.1 

Any help would be appreciated. I want to be able to last-hit again.

replies.body:
Hey Blu Medic, 

You have tried a lot of different things! o.o You may want to submit a ticket into Riot Support with all of the processes you have tried. That way they can look into the issue :) 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

> [{quoted}](name=GoldPikaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zU8rEHJI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-12T23:45:00.447+0000)
>
> Hey Blu Medic, 
> 
> You have tried a lot of different things! o.o You may want to submit a ticket into Riot Support with all of the processes you have tried. That way they can look into the issue :)

I never get replies to support tickets though. I've had more human replies to tbis thread tbh.
Same, been having ping problems since the patch.

> [{quoted}](name=RaptorJesus1098,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zU8rEHJI,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-13T18:12:23.626+0000)
>
> Same, been having ping problems since the patch.

Is it the same just generically high or fluctuating?

I haven't found a solution, and I'm pretty sure it's not me that's the problem.

Don't worry, riot does not care about you, just the same as they don't care about me.
I Have the same problem, made a post about it, and it was erased.
